Mohammed Abdel Rahman Abdel Raouf Arafat al-Qudwa al-Husseini (1929-2004), Palestinian leader, popularly known as Yasser Arafat
pinyin: Ya4 xi1 er3 · A1 la1 fa3 te4

sentences.english: Yasir Arafat bears much of the blame.
sentences.chinese: 最受指责的是阿拉法特。

sentences.english: I and others on our team had urged Arafat to prevent violence.
sentences.chinese: 我和代表团的其他成员一直敦促阿拉法特制止暴力。

sentences.english: In 1985, Israel sent fighter planes to kill arafat.
sentences.chinese: 1985年以色列曾派战斗机袭击阿拉法特。

sentences.english: If he left, there was a real chance Arafat would not go forward.
sentences.chinese: 如果没有特内特，阿拉法特很有可能不会继续合作。

sentences.english: When Arafat said he would be there, I again asked Rabin to come.
sentences.chinese: 当阿拉法特说他会到场时，我再次邀请拉宾也来。

sentences.english: Arafat immediately began to equivocate, asking for clarifications.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉法特立即开始含糊其词，要求对条款加以解释。

sentences.english: 17Pilgrims pray on the side of Mount Arafat, near Mecca, Saudi Arabia on Monday, Nov. 15, 2010. (AP Photo/Hassan Ammar)
sentences.chinese: 11月15日，朝圣者在麦加附近阿拉法特山边祈祷。

sentences.english: I knew Arafat wanted to do it.
sentences.chinese: 我知道阿拉法特想要这么做。

sentences.english: He was the only member of the Israeli delegation who would not shake hands with Arafat.
sentences.chinese: 他是以色列代表团中唯一不愿意和阿拉法特握手的人。

sentences.english: Then there was the question of whether Rabin and Arafat would shake hands.
sentences.chinese: 然后就是拉宾和阿拉法特是否会握手的问题。

sentences.english: Muslim pilgrims arrive at the plain of Arafat, near Mecca December 18, 2007 .
sentences.chinese: 穆斯林朝觐者抵达靠近麦加的阿拉法特平原。

sentences.english: Arafat said hello to Rabin and held out his hand.
sentences.chinese: 阿拉法特向拉宾问好并伸出手来。
